item.title: The perfect social network? Google+ isn't it. - TNW Social Media
item.description: History doesn't lie: There will never be a perfect social network http://tnw.to/1A6og by @BradMcCarty
item.content:encoded: History doesn't lie: There will never be a perfect social network http://tnw.to/1A6og by @BradMcCarty It wasn’t all that long ago, in the scope of actual years, that we were communicating via BBS. Some of you might remember those. You’d sign in, via your 14.4 modem (though truth be told, the BBS dates back to the days of the 600 baud modem), post your thoughts and see what others were saying. If we’re going to look at a history of social networks via computers, then the BBS has to be high on that list. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: thenextweb.com
